name: War Robots: Frontiers
description:
Following the discovery of the Wild 10, a cluster of distant worlds rich with resources and opportunities, Earth is left behind in favor of these promising new frontiers. However, conflict follows and three factions begin an endless war for control. Pilots — the operators of powerful War Robots — enforce their iron fisted rule.
Seize control of your very own fleet of War Robots, define the Wild 10's destiny as a Pilot, and pave the way to a glorious new future in War Robots: Frontiers!
FIGHT IN ONLINE PVP BATTLES
Jump in the cockpit of a War Robot, venture to new battlegrounds on distant worlds, and team up with friends for thrilling, fast-paced, 6v6 PvP battles.
SMASH UP DESTRUCTIBLE ENVIRONMENTS
Maps will react visibly as battle rages on. Fight enemy War Robots through destructible terrain, and watch as the world and its Robots wear down, crumble, and break.
CREATE & CUSTOMIZE WAR ROBOTS
You can build new War Robots and engineer them to battle-ready perfection. Arm your fleet with new weapons, abilities, modules, Robot Pilots, and special cosmetic upgrades!
UNLEASH YOUR ALPHA ROBOT
Shoot and smash enemy War Robots to build up your Alpha Power gauge. When it's full, you can unleash your ultimate secret weapon — the Alpha Robot — for maximum damage!
